query:
INSERT INTO activity_spots (name, description, spotType, difficulty, islandGuideId, latitude, longitude, depth, marineLife, bestSeason, bestTime, slug, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
-- Thulusdhoo Island Snorkeling
('Thulusdhoo House Reef', 'Beautiful house reef with vibrant coral and tropical fish, perfect for beginners. Excellent for first-time snorkelers.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 1, 4.374369, 73.651413, '0-5', 'Tropical fish, clownfish, parrotfish, damselfish', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'thulusdhoo-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Reef Edge Snorkel', 'Shallow reef edge with colorful coral formations and abundant marine life. Great for families and beginners.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 1, 4.375, 73.652, '2-8', 'Angelfish, butterflyfish, wrasse, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'reef-edge-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Kandooma Island Snorkeling
('Kandooma House Reef', 'Pristine house reef with excellent visibility and diverse coral species. Ideal for all skill levels.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 2, 3.90275, 73.47362, '1-6', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, surgeonfish, snappers', 'Year-round', '8am-5pm', 'kandooma-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Kandooma Lagoon Snorkel', 'Shallow lagoon snorkeling with calm waters and abundant coral gardens. Perfect for families.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 2, 3.903, 73.474, '0-4', 'Tropical fish, sea turtles, rays, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-4pm', 'kandooma-lagoon-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),
('Kandooma Reef Drift', 'Gentle drift snorkel along the reef with strong marine life presence. Intermediate level.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Intermediate', 2, 3.902, 73.475, '3-12', 'Trevally, tuna, jacks, snappers, grouper', 'Mar-Oct', '10am-3pm', 'kandooma-reef-drift', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Dhigurah Island Snorkeling
('Dhigurah House Reef', 'Excellent house reef with clear waters and vibrant coral ecosystem. Great for all levels.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 3, 3.5225, 72.9210, '1-7', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, wrasse, angelfish', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'dhigurah-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Maamigili Reef Snorkel', 'Popular snorkeling site near Maamigili with abundant fish and coral. Good visibility.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Intermediate', 3, 3.52, 72.92, '3-10', 'Snappers, grouper, trevally, fusiliers', 'Mar-Oct', '9am-3pm', 'maamigili-reef-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Rasdhoo Island Snorkeling
('Rasdhoo House Reef', 'Beautiful house reef with calm waters perfect for beginners. Excellent coral and fish diversity.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 4, 4.2628, 72.9914, '0-6', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, damselfish, wrasse', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'rasdhoo-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Rasdhoo Lagoon Snorkel', 'Shallow lagoon with protected waters ideal for families and beginners.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 4, 4.263, 72.992, '1-5', 'Tropical fish, rays, sea turtles, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'rasdhoo-lagoon-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),
('Rasdhoo Reef Wall', 'Stunning reef wall with strong currents and pelagic fish. Advanced snorkelers only.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Advanced', 4, 4.262, 72.990, '5-20', 'Sharks, manta rays, trevally, jacks, tuna', 'Mar-Oct', '10am-2pm', 'rasdhoo-reef-wall', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Veligandu Island Snorkeling
('Veligandu House Reef', 'Pristine house reef with excellent visibility and diverse marine life. Perfect for all levels.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 5, 4.1667, 72.8667, '1-7', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, angelfish, wrasse', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'veligandu-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Veligandu Coral Garden', 'Spectacular coral formations with calm waters. Ideal for families and photographers.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 5, 4.167, 72.867, '0-5', 'Tropical fish, sea turtles, rays, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'veligandu-coral-garden', NOW(), NOW()),
('Veligandu Kandu Snorkel', 'Channel snorkel with strong currents and abundant pelagic fish. Intermediate to advanced.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Intermediate', 5, 4.166, 72.868, '4-15', 'Manta rays, eagle rays, trevally, snappers', 'Mar-Oct', '10am-2pm', 'veligandu-kandu-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Maafushi Island Snorkeling
('Maafushi House Reef', 'Popular house reef with calm waters and abundant coral. Great for beginners and families.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 6, 4.1833, 72.8167, '0-6', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, surgeonfish, damselfish', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'maafushi-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Maafushi Lagoon Snorkel', 'Shallow lagoon with protected waters perfect for first-time snorkelers.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 6, 4.184, 72.817, '1-4', 'Tropical fish, rays, sea turtles, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'maafushi-lagoon-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Fulidhoo Island Snorkeling
('Fulidhoo House Reef', 'Beautiful house reef with excellent visibility and diverse marine life.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 7, 3.6333, 72.8167, '1-7', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, angelfish, wrasse', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'fulidhoo-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Fulidhoo Reef Snorkel', 'Scenic reef snorkel with calm waters and abundant coral gardens.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 7, 3.634, 72.817, '0-5', 'Tropical fish, sea turtles, rays, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'fulidhoo-reef-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Felidhoo Island Snorkeling
('Felidhoo House Reef', 'Pristine house reef with clear waters and vibrant coral ecosystem.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 8, 3.5833, 72.8500, '1-6', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, damselfish, wrasse', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'felidhoo-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Felidhoo Lagoon Snorkel', 'Shallow lagoon perfect for families and beginners with protected waters.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 8, 3.584, 72.851, '0-4', 'Tropical fish, rays, sea turtles, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'felidhoo-lagoon-snorkel', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Male City Snorkeling
('Male City House Reef', 'Accessible house reef near Male with good coral and fish diversity.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 9, 4.1667, 73.5167, '0-6', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, surgeonfish, angelfish', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'male-city-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),

-- Ukulhas Island Snorkeling
('Ukulhas House Reef', 'Excellent house reef with calm waters and abundant marine life. Perfect for all levels.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 10, 4.215128, 72.864471, '1-7', 'Clownfish, parrotfish, wrasse, angelfish', 'Year-round', '8am-4pm', 'ukulhas-house-reef', NOW(), NOW()),
('Ukulhas Coral Sanctuary', 'Protected coral area with pristine conditions and diverse fish species.', 'snorkeling_spot', 'Beginner', 10, 4.215, 72.864, '0-5', 'Tropical fish, sea turtles, rays, grouper', 'Year-round', '9am-3pm', 'ukulhas-coral-sanctuary', NOW(), NOW());
